summary: I’m weird but sometimes I start reading a fic in the mindset of imagining it happened to actual real life Dan and Phil and then...
question: I’m weird but sometimes I start reading a fic in the mindset of imagining it happened to actual real life Dan and Phil and then something bad happens and I just have to stop, remember this didn’t actually happen to them, and start reading from the beginning again but with a mindset of just two lovely characters called Dan and Phil otherwise it hurst me way too much lol it’s weird but like that’s also why I appreciate if it says if something has a good/bad ending so I can prepare myself for that
answer:
I don’t think it’s weird at all. 

After I read an angsty fic, I go to my list of happy canon fics or happy canon videos just to remind myself that this wasn’t real and that the reality we live in is as angst less as it can get. But I definitely get what you are saying. I almost never read canon and au at the same time, and I prefer AUs that are as different as possible from canon for that exact reason. It sometimes just hurts too much. I also physically can’t deal with bad endings at all. I just skip fics with bad endings. Can’t handle it.

It sometimes just hurts too much. I also physically can’t deal with bad endings at all. I just skip fics with bad endings. Can’t handle it.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: the thing i most desperately crave in this world is an early morning insta story where phil rolls out of bed and stands up to...
body: the thing i most desperately crave in this world is an early morning insta story where phil rolls out of bed and stands up to give us a good look at dan still sleeping in the bunk above him (because he’s tall enough that it would work, y’know), and then he’d return the favour and run his fingers through dan’s curls the same way dan pushed phil’s hair off of his forehead during tatinof, and dan would like tilt his head up and kiss phil’s palm and i would die peacefully.

reblog.comment: the thing i most desperately crave in this world is an early morning insta story where phil rolls out of bed and stands up to give us a good look at dan still sleeping in the bunk above him (because he’s tall enough that it would work, y’know), and then he’d return the favour and run his fingers through dan’s curls the same way dan pushed phil’s hair off of his forehead during tatinof, and dan would like tilt his head up and kiss phil’s palm and i would die peacefully.

summary: perfectly out of key summary: dan is having one of his “off”-days and phil helps him by playing the piano  wordcount: 1.8k...
body:
perfectly out of key

summary: dan is having one of his “off”-days and phil helps him by playing the piano 
wordcount: 1.8k
warnings: some dissociation/derealisation, light angst 
a/n: i know next to nothing about playing the piano so i’m sorry if this is kinda not how it’s done lmao but i guess that’s also not the like main part of the story anyway. hope u like it!

excerpt:
Phil is silent for a few moments. He’s just standing there, not that close but not very far away either, and Dan can just about hear him breathing. It’s a comforting sound that reminds him of lazy mornings spent in bed, and it pulls him back to reality just the slightest. 

And then he moves. He takes the few steps forward until he’s right next to Dan, and without so much as a word he sits down on the piano stool beside him. 

read on ao3

blog.name: ihateeveryone2002
blog.title: Frickin Zazzed
blog.description: Beth ~ 17 ~ Dan and Phil ~ band trash ~ would die for Dodie ~ queer demisexul

summary:
Ik I'm like, a few years late, but guess who just ordered The Amazing Book is Not On Fire? 
Let me have this, I'm poor, so could...
body:
Ik I’m like, a few years late, but guess who just ordered The Amazing Book is Not On Fire?

Let me have this, I’m poor, so could only get it now…

BUT WAIT I was freakin zazzed bc I found a Waterstones gift card in my purse n I checked online n I had TWENTY FRIKIN POUNDS and I hopped online and ordered the book!

You don’t understand, as someone who feels like the world’s constantly against me, this was a fucking big deal 😂

summary: Shopping Trip
title: Shopping Trip
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Nzuo28

by phanburnhamizzard

After a hot morning of moving heavy boxes into their new apartment, Dan and Phil head to the nearest shopping mall to pick up a few necessities and grab a bite to eat. Agreeing on items and staying on budget becomes a point of contention between the two.

This story is part of the 30 day challenge to create art about your OTP with a different theme for each day. Today’s theme was ‘Shopping Trip’ .

This work was inspired by https://ift.tt/2KX598d.

Words: 1595, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phan, dan and phil, Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

  • Additional Tags: DAN AND PHIL - Freeform, 30 Day OTP Challenge, alannaharlow, Shopping, dan and phil fluff, Fluff, Domestic, dan and phil domestic, fight, dan and phil fight


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Nzuo28
